title: Capulin Volcano National Monument: Park Newspaper
body: Park Newspaper       Capulin Volcano National Monument's official newspaper contains current news, schedules, and information about the park. Capulin Volcano National Monument publishes the Capulin Chronicle biannually in May and October. These publications are freely distributed by the park and may be downloaded from this page. All of these digital publications require the free Adobe Acrobat Reader for viewing. For best results, we suggest that you download the file to your computer before viewing or printing. Many more publications are available through the park's bookstore.  Capulin Chronicle Fall 2012 (309K pdf) Capulin Chronicle Spring 2012 (602K pdf) Capulin Chronicle Fall 2011 (943K pdf)
